channel.title: Pages on Mithi's Robotics Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Mithi's Robotics Blog

item.description: Ideas Ideas for robotics projects I want to do Part 1 Bossy: A custom general-purpose wireless controller Build controller Build with I already have Control Two custom robots with Bossy Robot #1 Arm Tank - MeArm 1.0 (Open-source 4-axis manipulator) on top of a metal tank chassis Robot #2 Hacked Toy RC car frame, with pan-tilt servos and brushless motor 7Bot

Readings References useful for my projects that I may not have gotten around to reading yet Object Oriented Arduino Arduino.cc: Writing a Library for Arduino Arduino.cc: Arduino Style Guide for Writing Libraries Arduino the Object Oriented Way Arduino Object Oriented Programming (OOP) Arduino Project Directory Structure Nov 18, 2019 | Arduino Github: Arduno IDE 1.5 Library Specification Jul 22, 2018 | Stack Exchange: Arduino IDE and subfolders Jan 31, 2017 | Stack Exchange: How do I configure the Arduino IDE to look for source code in a subdirectory within the directory that holds my sketch?

Wishlist Creality Ender Pro 3D Printer Raspberry Pi Zero W 2x - Adafruit Servo Bonnets 32x - metal gear micro servos (9-14g) Materials to build own drone Materials to build own open dog M5StickV AI Camera - Kendryte K210 Chipset
